 Hero of the Day

 Main riff:
 
 G-----------2---2(4)---2(5)---2(7)---------------------
 D---------------------------------------------------------
 A----0---0----2-------4-------5-------7-7-7--7-7-7-7-7-7--
 E--2---2--------------------------------------------------
 
 Now the fast part... do the notes however many times
 you need to get the right rhythm
 
 G----------------    G----------------
 D----------------    D----------------
 A----------------    A----------------
 E--2-2--2-2-2-2--    E--3-3--3-3-3-3--
 
 The first of these rhythms is played most of the time
